segments.text: Tom and Helen got married at last .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How did you know that ? I heart Tom ’ s father didn ’ t agree with that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was invited to attend their wedding .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s great . Although his father didn ’ t agree with that , Tom went through with it .
segments.speaker: S2
